keywords.value: WYMAN, M. RICHARD. THE PARTNERS AND EMPLOYEES OF FIRST MANHATTAN CO. MOURN THE PASSING OF OUR LONG, TIME FRIEND AND COLLEAGUE, DICK WYMAN. DICK BECAME A MANAGING DIRECTOR IN 1993, AND SERVED AS A WONDERFUL AMBASSADOR FOR THE FIRM. HIS CLIENTS TRUSTED HIS SAGE ADVICE AND HE WAS RESPECTED AND BELOVED BY THEM AND US. WE OFFER OUR SINCEREST CONDOLENCES TO HIS WIFE, JUDY, AND HIS FAMILY. 1
keywords.name: persons

lead_paragraph: WYMAN--M. Richard. The partners and employees of First Manhattan Co. mourn the passing of our long-time friend and colleague, Dick Wyman. Dick became a Managing Director in 1993, and served as a wonderful ambassador for the Firm. His clients trusted his sage advice and he was respected and beloved by them and us. We offer our sincerest condolences to his wife, Judy, and his family. 1
